name: Delicious: Emily's Honeymoon Cruise
summary: Follow the newlyweds as Patrick and Emily embark on their celebration cruise. Sailing off into the horizon of wedded bliss, Emily soon discovers she doesn't know how to relax and she certainly isn't used to having others take care of her. To make matters worse, when Patrick tells her he's excited to start a family as soon as possible, Emily's response is tepid -- she's not sure she's ready for that just yet. Can they find a way to be happy? Grab a life preserver and join the adventure!
